short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will display the local weather as widget

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A weather widget extension which shows the data for weather of the users location. It will let users to know the current weather data in their locations.
